titles.title: To amend the act of incorporation of the American University to reduce the minimum number of members of the University's Board of Trustees from 40 to 25.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on District of Columbia.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 11/28/1995--Introduced. Amends Federal law relating to the incorporation of the American University to reduce the minimum number of members of that University's Board of Trustees from 40 to 25.
